text: Lois Jane Frankel (born May 16, 1948, New York City) is an American politician and lawyer. In 2017, Frankel became the United States Representative under Florida's 21st congressional district. Between 2013 and 2017, she also represented Florida's 22nd congressional district. She is a member under the U.S. Democratic Party. Frankel was a member under the Florida House of Representatives for fourteen years. She was the Minority Leader under the Florida State House. She was later elected the Mayor for West Palm Beach in 2003. Frankel was the mayor from 2003 to 2011. In the latter year, she left office due to term limits. On December 18, 2019, Frankel voted for the impeachment of then-President Donald Trump. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American mayors Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from New York City Category:United States representatives from Florida Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:People from West Palm Beach, Florida
title: Lois Frankel
